commit.message:
function.c (instantiate_virtual_regs): Instantiate virtual registers found in CALL_INSN_FUNCTION_USAGE.

        * function.c (instantiate_virtual_regs): Instantiate virtual
        registers found in CALL_INSN_FUNCTION_USAGE.
